div.p: Association for Geography at Halle on the Saale

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The undersigned committee of the Association for Geography at Halle on the Saale has the honour to hereby inform Baron Ferdinand von Mueller that in the meeting of 14 April 1880 he has been appointed as Corresponding Member.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
